Talon:

"One is POW, the other one is missing in this base"said Talon while=
 she tought only for her in a sacartic way "and a former one helping in the=
 hunt"


OCC: Talon is a former minion, she betrayed Unicron and swich her =
signature and her beast form and allied with Maximals, Lord Perseus and Ken=
xo knows who was. She fears that Unicron finds her. 


From: Super Cyclonus=
 
Sent: Saturday, February 13, 2010 3:25 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Sub=
ject: Re: The Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come back


  
>Talon:
> 
>"Report=
 at my location and we can start to secire the 
>area" said talon

"Underst=
ood." Legacy intoned from his aerial position, his voice cold and unfeeling=
 over the transmission lines. 

Above the old Maximal base the military sat=
ellite that was Legacy shifted and contorted as it changed forms, the sound=
 of gears moving together could be heard as it quickly assumed its armored =
robotic mode. Boosters flare for a moment allowing Legacy to touch down and=
 look around, his single optic shifted colors then resuming its typical cri=
mson glow. 

Turning his rather bulky form Legacy quickly made his way to T=
alon's position, "I see no evidence of an attack in progress, although ther=
e are residual energy patterns here." Legacy turned his cold gaze on talon,=
 "Where are the minions?"

(OOC: I am not sure where the other Maximals are=
, or where Talon is in relation to all of this, so I was somewhat vague. Th=
is should open to anyone that is in the area I would guess??) 

Preston
(Le=
gacy)
